control.name: Responsive checkbox
control.helpHtml: A labelled control that toggles the presence of a tick when clicked. It resizes with screen-width and moves down if it gets too small.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Form summary label
property.helpHtml: Summary label to appear at the end of the form. Leave blank to have the control and its value hidden.

property.name: Checked
property.helpHtml: Sets the state of the checkbox to be true or false.

property.name: Value
property.helpHtml: Option that can be set to make validating on a checkbox easier.

property.name: Text
property.helpHtml: Sets a text like description for the checkbox.
